# Issue Template

Please follow one of the two categories below.

## 1. Bug Reports

Here is the thing. We need details to fix bugs.
So here is what happened is what you tell us.

### The Steps

1. Open the game
2. Do the action
3. See the error

### What you expected

Tell us what should happen.
This might work for you if you check your logs.
Add photos if you have them.

## 2. Feature Requests

Tell us what new thing you want to add.
This can help you and other players.

### Your Idea

Explain your new idea here.
Keep it simple.

### Why it matters

Tell us why we need this in the game.
And that is why it matters.
